parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets right picture on the tree view item defined by path

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[tvSetPictureRight]] [idc, path, name]

</value></part><part><name> p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name> p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - path to tree view item

</value></part><part><name> p3</name>=<value> name: [[String]] - picture texture

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> control [[tvSetPictureRight]] [path, name]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - path to tree view item

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> name: [[String]] - picture texture

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[tvSetPictureRight]] [101, [0], "picture"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[tvSetPictureRight]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0], "picture"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[tvPictureRight]] [[tvSetPicture]] [[tvPicture]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
</dl></root>
